name: acassis
cooked: I think self-certification is the way to go. Otherwise it could became expensive for hobbyist and small companies to get approaved certification. In the other hand OSHWA needs to enforce some law and penalties for people/organization using the open-harware logo/certification without fulfill with its requirements.
raw: I think self-certification is the way to go. Otherwise it could became expensive for hobbyist and small companies to get approaved certification. In the other hand OSHWA needs to enforce some law and penalties for people/organization using the open-harware logo/certification without fulfill with its requirements.
